testcase.classname: US1018 Kullanici girdigi bilgilerle yeni kayit olusturur
testcase.name: TC25 yeni kayit olusturup, kayit olustugu test eder
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "autoExerciseUrl" anasayfaya gider..........................passed And 1 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And user sign up linkine tiklar.............................................passed And 1 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And user Create an account bolumune email adresi girer......................passed And 1 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And signUp butonuna basar...................................................passed And 1 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And user kisisel bilgilerini ve iletisim bilgilerini girer..................passed And user Create Account butonuna basar......................................passed Then hesap olustugunu test eder.............................................passed And 3 saniye bekler.........................................................passed
